## Macierze:

```{r}
X = rnorm(5000, 0, 1)
mat = matrix(X, nrow=10, ncol=500)
apply(mat, 2, var)
apply(mat, 2, Var2)
## średnia z próby
Var2 <- function(x){
  mean((x-mean(x))^2)
}
```
